message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $11,000? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my means.
